title: The Samurai. Volume 2
creator_credit: Senkosha, Toshio Kobayashi and Toru Toyama
brief_description: Three episodes from the classic 60’s television series. Shintaro and Tombie, “the Mist” travel feudal Japan, fighting evil, and protecting the innocent. “Living Death”: Shintaro and his followers are protecting the Prince from the Death Ninja. Disguised as an old man the Death Ninja breaks through their defence. Tombei is captured and Shintaro faces his enemy in a fight to the death. “The Spider”: Shintaro is sent to recover gold hidden in Koga country and is lured into a trap by a female Ninja. “Musai’s curse”: The Fuma Ninja have returned to reclaim their lands and the Fire Dragon Mirror in the castle. A deadly curse is placed on the Lord of the castle and his daughter is taken hostage. Who ya gonna call?
